level_1.skillDescription:
Chain up to 4 longe ranged attacks using a bow and arrow
Perform a 5-way cone shaped attack in front of you by holding the key during the 2nd attack

level_2.skillDescription: Alternate to an earth elemental area attack by holding the key during the 3rd attack

level_3.skillDescription: Hold the key during the first attack to apply a Speed Up status effect to nearby players in front of you
